questions.question: This story arc is named after its geographical formation and features the first appearance of Admiral Aokiji. What is...?
questions.answer: The Long Ring Long Land Arc

questions.question: Set on a frozen island, this arc involves the Straw Hat Pirates and the G-5 marines against a former Warlord of the Sea. What is...?
This arc features Luffy's journey to a prison mine where he encounters a key character from his past. What is...?
This technique, used by Franky, involves a powerful blast from his mechanical body. What is...?
This technique, utilized by Sanji, sets his leg on fire, enhancing the power of his kicks. What is...?
This power is used to harden the body and weapons, increasing their offensive and defensive capabilities. What is...?
This commander of the Revolutionary Army's eastern forces is known for her ability to turn her body into art. Who is...?
This member of the Straw Hat Pirates is a skilled swordsman who wields three swords and aspires to become the world's greatest swordsman. Who is...?
This character, a member of the Straw Hat Pirates and a skilled archaeologist, is known for her ability to read Poneglyphs. Who is...?
